entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:30 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
